name: PearPhone.io
description:
PearPhone.io is a free 3D Third-Person Shooter game with intuitive controls and exciting gameplay.

Prove your strength in Free-For-All or Team-Death-Match game mode. Battle against other pearphones and claim victory!

Buy skins for your character or camos for your weapons to upgrade your game experience.

Combat against other players all around the world or intelligent bots and feel unlimited action!

Host private matches and have fun with your friends in exciting combats!
